title: Starscattered

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Bless a player for this night and the next, giving them powerful protection that blocks one attack per night.
- Create a constellation out of a dead player who has died since the beginning of the previous night, which astrally performs that roleâ€™s first ability on all living players, including Coven members.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may use players who have been cleaned/stoned.
- Constellations with day abilities will come into effect instantly the following day.
- Roles with a limited amount of charges will act starting from Player 1 and moving downwards.
- You may bless yourself.
- With the Necronomicon,  your blessings deal a cleaning basic attack to any non-Coven visitor and you are permanently blessed.
